channel.title: -How do i change the coordinates of places like home?-
channel.description:
Hello moparscape, i need some help.
I'm just wondering on how to change the coordinates of areas such as home, and train etc.
When i go in client.java i search for the coords of the home area and it doesn't do anything, All i found was the command ::home and the coords that that teleports to. So i changed them to my area and compiled it etc, and it still didn't work, so i need the following help.
How to change the coords and actually get them to set! Where to find the teleport tabs so i can change them.
Please help me with this, pleaseeee!

item.title: -How do i change the coordinates of places like home?-
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Thanks, but can you please tell me how to do that? Or tell me how to change where you start off?

Read full topic
item.source: -How do i change the coordinates of places like home?-
